assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Initial_Initiation_Criteria_Q6
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Are Serum Protein Electrophoresis (SPEP) and Urine Protein Electrophoresis (UPEP) and Serum Free Light Chains (SFLC) negative for the presence of a monoclonal protein? PLEASE ATTACH REPORT
